translations: adj.结构凌乱的，无条理的，没有正式组织的；（服装）不用或少用内衬的

phrs.translation: n. （对考生进行的）口头审查；非结构化面试；非结构性面谈

sentences.sentence: Our aim was that these meetings be unstructured and informal.
sentences.translation: 我们的目标是使这些会议不拘泥于固定结构，不过于正式。

sentences.sentence: Much of the movement has focused on the educational value of play, and efforts to restore recess and unstructured playtime to early childhood.
sentences.translation: 这场运动的重点是玩耍的教育价值，以及努力重建童年时期的休息和自由玩耍时间。

sentences.sentence: Back up your original unstructured files.
sentences.translation: 备份原始的非结构化文件。
